Plot: A handyman/martial arts master agrees to teach a bullied boy karate and shows him that there is more to the martial art than fighting.
Title: The Karate Kid
Actors: Ralph Macchio, Pat Morita, Elisabeth Shue, Martin Kove
tomatoConsensus: Utterly predictable and wholly of its time, but warm, sincere, and difficult to resist, due in large part to Pat Morita and Ralph Macchio's relaxed chemistry.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 2 wins & 2 nominations.
